channel.title: World News - Breaking international news and headlines | Sky News

image.title: World News - Breaking international news and headlines | Sky News

channel.description: The latest international news from Sky, featuring top stories from around the world and breaking news, as it happens.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2021, Sky UK. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: North Korea defector tells of dramatic escape and reveals what life is really like in secretive state
item.description: For David, the streets of Seoul are a much longed for safe haven.
item.media:description: A North Korea defector - who has given his name as David - speaks to Sky News from the safety of Seoul, South Korea.

item.title: British sisters die in West Bank shooting - as Italian tourist killed in Tel Aviv terror attack
item.description: An Italian tourist has been killed and several people injured in a terror attack in Tel Aviv, hours after it was confirmed that two women who died in a West Bank shooting were British.
item.media:description: The scene of the attack in the Jordan Valley area of the West Bank

item.title: The 'leaked war plans' could prove embarrassing for the US - but useful for Russia
item.description: Top Secret documents detailing the state of readiness of Ukraine’s forces as well as detailed planning information around equipment inflow, weather, ammunition expenditure, training and much more have been circulating on Telegram and Twitter.
item.media:description: NATO sign is seen as Spanish troops wait for a celebration ceremony of the 5th anniversary of the Canadian-led NATO enhanced Forward Presence battlegroup in Adazi, Latvia June 15, 2022. REUTERS/Ints Kalnins

item.title: 'Secret NATO plans leaked' for war in Ukraine
item.description: Secret documents disclosing efforts by US, the UK and other NATO allies to build up Ukraine's forces ahead of a new offensive against Russian troops appear to have been leaked online.
item.media:description: Ukrainian service men Oleksandr and Oleksandr of the 24th brigade stand guard at their position in the trenches at the frontline, amid Russia's attack on Ukraine, near Niu York, Donetsk region, Ukraine, April 4, 2023. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach

item.title: 'Guns don't have capacity to commit crime', says sheriff as 12-year-old arrested in shooting that killed three teenagers
item.description: A sheriff in Florida went on a rant against gun control while announcing the arrests of a 12-year-old and a 17-year-old in connection with a shooting that left three dead.

item.title: Pope to miss Good Friday procession due to 'extremely cold weather' in Rome
item.description: Pope Francis will miss the Good Friday procession due to "extremely cold weather in Rome", the Vatican said.
item.media:description: Pope Francis holding Easter Sunday Mass in 2020

item.title: Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich formally charged with spying in Russia
item.description: Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich has been formally charged with spying in Russia, state-run news agencies have reported today.
item.media:description: Reporter for U.S. newspaper The Wall Street Journal Evan Gershkovich

item.title: 'Slight improvement' in Silvio Berlusconi's condition after being admitted to hospital
item.description: There has been a "slight improvement" in Italy's former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi's health condition after he was admitted to hospital under intensive care for a lung infection.
item.media:description: Forza Italia leader and former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi arrives for a meeting with Italian President Sergio Mattarella at the Quirinale Palace in Rome, Italy October 21, 2022. REUTERS/Guglielmo Mangiapane

item.title: Two Tennessee Democrats expelled over gun control protest
item.description: Tennessee's Republican-dominated House of Representatives has expelled two Democrats over their participation in a gun control demonstration at the state legislature last week.
item.media:description: Democrat representatives Justin Jones and Justin Pearson were expelled from the Tennessee state legislature

item.title: Deadly snake found under seat on plane - and there's a twist in the tail
item.description: A pilot in South Africa made an emergency landing after finding a highly venomous cobra hiding under his seat.
